DLV.Directive

Uses of Directive in DLV

          This class represent an ExportDirective.
 class ImportDirective
          This class represents an ImportDirective.
 class ODBCDirective
          This class represent an ODBCDirective.
 

Methods in DLV that return Directive

          Gets the i-th directive.

 void Dlv.removeDirective(Directive d)
          Removes a new directive.
